name: Gods of Savvarah
description:
"Gods of Savvarah" is an interactive story (visual novel) in the fantasy genre, inspired by classic RPGs.

Savvarah is an evergreen paradise hidden from the eyes of strangers.

The godlike and all-powerful tyrant Ackotal has sealed himself off from the world and created his own state in the middle of the forest with a rigid hierarchy, at the very bottom of which are lizard-slaves. Hasvah was one of them.

One day, however, the slave receives the chance not only to break out of his imprisonment, but also to change the destinies of other characters and entire nations.

In this great adventure, the protagonist visits different countries, encountering their inhabitants, both ordinary people and gods.

The world of Savvarah is ruthless, so the protagonist has to either fight for his life or die along the way. 

Our main features are:

- An original fantasy world, in which Hasvah will visit around five major locations;

- Choices can lead you to seven endings. Besides, there are even more ways to achieve these endings;

- Dozens of characters, each with their own story and appearance;

- Intense battles in every chapter;

- An elaborate visual style and an original and diverse soundtrack;

- Nine chapters planned. Meanwhile, you can't see all the chapters in a single playthrough, and a full picture of the world and an understanding of a character's motives and actions can only emerge in subsequent playthroughs.
